description: Since 1965 Lenmar has been building award winning, high quality power related products. Lenmar personally manages the excellence of our products through every aspect from design to production. The Lenmar ACUSB4 AC travel adapter for up to 4 USB powered devices solves the charging dilemma for international travelers. Lightweight, compact, and with 4 USB ports for your cell phone, MP3 player, or other USB powered devices, it's easy to carry, and frees you from worrying about having to charge one device at a time.
title: Lenmar Universal AC Wall Charger with 4 USB ports for use with iPhone, Android  smartphones and other USB powered devices. Includes interchangeable, international adapter plugs for use in Europe, North America, UK and Australia.
